metadata.title: Open Agent Skills
metadata.description: A simple, open format for giving agents new capabilities and expertise

home.title: Agent Skills
home.subtitle: A simple, open format for giving agents new capabilities and expertise

expertise.title: Domain Expertise
expertise.description: Package specialized knowledge into reusable instructions, from legal review processes to data analysis pipelines.

capabilities.title: New Capabilities
capabilities.description: Give agents new capabilities like creating presentations, building MCP servers, or analyzing datasets.

workflows.title: Repeatable Workflows
workflows.description: Turn multi-step tasks into consistent and auditable workflows.

interoperability.title: Interoperability
interoperability.description: Reuse the same skill across different skills-compatible agent products.

home.whyDescription: Agents are increasingly capable, but often don't have the context they need to do real work reliably. Skills solve this by giving agents access to procedural knowledge they can load on demand.
